alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect northwestern Washington... southern Piscataquis...southeastern Aroostook and central Penobscot Counties... At 635 PM EDT...An area of heavy snow was along a line extending from Haynesville to Brownville...and moving northwest AT 20 MPH. Locations impacted include... Houlton, Millinocket, Dover-Foxcroft, Greenville, Guilford, Patten, Danforth, Vanceboro, Brownville Junction, Mount Katahdin, Ripogenus, Milo, East Millinocket, Medway, Hodgdon, Sherman, Island Falls, Monson, Smyrna and Springfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 226 and 304. US Highway 1 between Brookton and Littleton. State Highway 11 between Milo and Knowles Corner. * Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour are occurring in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
